sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react'; import jwt_decode from 'jwt-decode'; import Article from './Article'; class Profile extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', title: '', author: '', body: '' } } componentDidMount () { const token = localStorage.usertoken const decoded = jwt_decode(token) this.setState({ first_name: decoded.first_name, last_name: decoded.last_name, email: decoded.email, title: decoded.title, author: decoded.author, body: decoded.body }) } render() { return (

Profile

First Name {this.state.first_name}
Last Name {this.state.last_name}
Email {this.state.email}
Title {this.state.title}
{this.state.author}
{this.state.body}
) } } export default Profile;
